headline: Copart (CPRT) Eyes Acquisitions, Capital Expenditures, Share Repurchases, and Global Expansion Initiatives with New Financing Facility
summary: Copart, Inc. (NASDAQ:CPRT) is included in our list of the 13 Best Extremely Profitable Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 26, 2026, Copart, Inc. (NASDAQ:CPRT) strengthened its financial flexibility by announcing a new $1.25 billion unsecured senior revolving credit facility, signed on January 23, 2026. This replaces and fully repays the previous facility with […]
